title: Design and evaluation of sulfadiazine derivatives as potent dual inhibitors of EGFRWT and EGFRT790M: integrating biological, molecular docking, and ADMET analysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28608-28625
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04165H, Paper

Hany M. Abd El-Lateef, Hend A. A. Ezelarab, Ali M. Ali, Azhaar T. Alsaggaf, Wael A. Mahdi, Sultan Alshehri, Mohamed A. El Hamd, Moustafa O. Aboelez
A series of derivatives (5–14) were synthesized through the diazotization of sulfadiazine with active methylene compounds.
